## Proving Variance Formula

### 1. Derive the Variance Formula Using Expectation Properties

Use the expected value properties to show that $\displaystyle \text{Var}(X) = \text{E}\left(X^2 \right) - \left( \text{E}(X) \right)^2$. Show each step and what properties used.
